name: Hl7VSExclusiveTest
title: hl7VS-exclusiveTest
description: Concepts that define if a test should be a specific event with no other tests to be performed with this test, or not, or other special circumstances.
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

contains.display: This test can be included with any number of other tests
In some cases, this test should be only exclusively with like tests (examples are cyto or pathology)
